name: Plunky
description:
Welcome to the adventures of Plunky!

This is a game idea I've had for quite sometime and now I have the time to bring it to life! Plunky is a physics based puzzle game, you must keep moving and collect as much coins as possible. This game is in the very early stages of development. Thanks for taking an interest in my game! Feel free to download this version and tell me what you think.
